name: dfscript
description: A way to create code templates for the Minecraft server DiamondFire, mcdiamondfire.com

scripts.build: echo Compiling Typescript... && tsc && echo Compiled Typescript successfully. && npx browserify dist/index.js -o dist/dfscript.unmin.js --standalone dfscript && echo minifying... && npx uglifyjs dist/dfscript.unmin.js --compress --mangle -o dfscript.min.js && cd dist/ && del dfscript.unmin.js && echo. && echo Done.
scripts.postpublish: git add . && git commit && git push origin master

author: UserUNP#9235
